page.title: 15Goverment Tiers
page.content: Saxmundham has a town,Benhall with Sternfield a parish council.Members are elected for 4 years,have limited powers,are consulted about planning decisions affecting area and precept Suffolk Suffolk Coastal for rate needed.Saxmundham ratepayers elect a representative for Suffolk Coastal meetings at Woodbridge.Benhall is in a group of parishes represented by a district councillor. Coastal make and set rates, are responsible for environmental health,housing and planning,cheap travel tickets for O.A.P.'s. and maintain sewers for Anglian Water.Clay Hill electors including Saxmundham and Plomesgates electors including Benhall each elect a representative to Suffolk County Council meetings in Ipswich.They set own rate, precept Coastal, are responsi ble for Education and Social services.
